text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Today, King Halo and I are going to a<n>fashion show for the
latest signature<n>racewear.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: We agreed to meet up at 9 a.m., but...

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: You're late! What time do you think it<n>is?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
If I say 9 a.m., then I mean 8 a.m.!<n>Gosh, how could you
keep me waiting<n>for a whole hour?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Making me, a first-rate Umamusume,<n>stand alone at the
back of the line...

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
As your punishment, you'll have to<n>treat me to some tea
before we head<n>back. Hmph, be grateful that I'm<n>letting
you off the hook this time!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Please, I'm practically being<n>magnanimous. Anyway,
enough with<n>the chitchat—hurry up and get in line!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: King Halo pulls me into the line.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
There are so many people here that it<n>might be hard to see
the stage.
choice_data_list: It seems like it's a pretty popular show.
It seems like it's a pretty popular show.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Of course it's popular... Perhaps you<n>don't fully
comprehend the<n>significance of today's event, so let<n>me
enlighten you.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Today, only the finest brands will be<n>shown. We'll see the
best outfits from<n>the best designers! Truly a first-rate<n>
experience!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
The show's going to be so good that<n>you won't even want
to blink. Don't<n>even think about looking away for a<n>
second!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Especially when it comes to...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
King Halo's eyes sparkle with<n>excitement as she rattles off
every<n>aspect of the fashion show.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: One hour later...

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
It's almost time for the show to start,<n>but we've barely
moved forward... I<n>can't see anything from here...

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I hope they didn't make us wait all<n>this time just to tell us
that they've<n>already reached max capacity...

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Why on earth would I do that?<n>Today's show is—

text_block_list.name: Show Staff
text_block_list.text: Excuse me, are you King Halo?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Ah... yes, that's right. Who might you<n>be?

text_block_list.name: Show Staff
text_block_list.text:
Aha, I had a feeling. I'm part of the<n>event operations team. I
wanted to<n>say that it's been an honor to work<n>with your
mother on the show—

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Ah, I see.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I'm well aware that my mother's<n>designs are the main
event and will be<n>showcased as the grand finale.

text_block_list.name: Show Staff
text_block_list.text:
So you're interested in her work as<n>well? Of course, you're
her daughter<n>after all. I've heard from your mother<n>that
you've been fantastic at Tracen—

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Are you sure that's what you heard?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Please, spare me the platitudes. Iknow well what she would say, andespecially what she wouldn't.Like you said, I am her daughter.

text_block_list.name: Show Staff
text_block_list.text: Oh, my apologies... Well, if you'll<n>excuse me then...

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: I guess he was one of my mother's<n>acquaintances.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Hm, it looks like you've got<n>something to say. Well, don't
make<n>me wait—just get it out already.
choice_data_list: I didn't know your mother was part of this show.
I didn't know your mother was part of this show.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
After my mother retired from racing,<n>she became a
professional designer<n>for signature racewear.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
It pains me to say this, but she truly<n>embodies "first-rate".
She surpasses<n>everyone's expectations with each<n>and
every dress she makes.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Her designs are timeless, crafted with<n>perfection for all
racers. There's a lot<n>to be learned from her work.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
...Well, I suppose not all racers. She<n>never made anything for
me.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
It doesn't matter though. Her talent in<n>design didn't carry
over into sewing.<n>Honestly, she's terribly clumsy.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Despite her own shortcomings, she's<n>always been overly
competitive and<n>vain. She's loath to show even her<n>own
daughter something less than<n>perfect.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I remember how she bought a<n>birthday cake for me,
watched me eat<n>it, then hid in another room to eat her<n>own
failed creation.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
It's ridiculous. I wish she'd just<n>acknowledge her
weaknesses and<n>failures.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Not at all!

text_block_list.name: Staff Member
text_block_list.text:
Everyone, thank you for waiting!<n>We'll now begin guiding
you all to the<n>event hall!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: It's about time. Come on, let's get<n>going.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
...They better show some excellent<n>dresses. Otherwise, I
won't forgive<n>them for making me wait so long.

text_block_list.name: Event Announcer
text_block_list.text:
And that concludes today's event.<n>Thank you for coming.
Please return<n>home safely.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
That... was... amazing! Did you see<n>the new designs by
UMADA? Oh my<n>gosh, I love how they designed the<n>
switching skirt!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: But the prettiest one was definitely—

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ...Never mind!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Hmph. Just you wait and see. I'm<n>going to surpass my
mother's race<n>record in no time.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
And I won't just have one signature<n>racewear—I'm going
to have a whole<n>closet full of them!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Because I'm a first-rate racer—the<n>one and only King Halo!
choice_data_list: Yes you are. Let's give it our all!
Yes you are. Let's give it our all!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Ohohoho! I'm glad you're on the<n>same page as me!
Excellent! ♪

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Let's head back to the academy now.<n>We've got lots of
planning to do for<n>tomorrow's training schedule!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As King Halo walks away from the<n>event hall, her face
shines with<n>ever-increasing determination.
